name: Devastator Cannon (Prox)
customPrimary:
Minor defects in the proximity fuse are fixed, resulting in a barrage that is equally powerful at maximum range.

Will target missiles if no other targets are in range.

name: Devastator Cannon (Burst)
customPrimary:
Each shell has a fuse set to explode at a random distance, resulting in a barrage that's increasingly more deadly at closer ranges.
The weapon's firing mechanism is modified, allowing it to fire in shorter bursts.

Will target missiles if no other targets are in range.

name: Devastator Cannon (Prox, Burst)
customPrimary:
Minor defects in the proximity fuse are fixed, resulting in a barrage that is equally powerful at maximum range.
The weapon's firing mechanism is modified, allowing it to fire in shorter bursts.

Will target missiles if no other targets are in range.

name: Hephaestus Assault Gun (Breach)
customPrimary: Each projectile deals an additional %s damage to armor. This damage is not reduced by armor.
